General.Name: Hubei Sanxia New Building Materials Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Sanxia New Building Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research, production, and sale of float glass, glass deep-processing products, and building materials in Mainland China. The company offers titanium dioxide film self-cleaning, tempered, laminated, and insulating glasses, as well as tempered glass covers. Hubei Sanxia New Building Materials Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Dangyang, China.
General.Address: Dangyang Economic Development Zone, Dangyang, China, 444105
